sect2.title: Introduction to dillo
sect2.para: Dillo is a fast, small footprint graphical browser. Although version 0.7.1 is alpha code, it is stable. Dillo does not support java or javascript, and the current version does not support cut and paste, ftp, https or frames. It is, however, very fast and so is useful on older, slower machines. It supports downloads and can support cookies.
